data.meta_description: TiruvAcakam - English Translation of Thiruvasagam by Rev.G.U - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is an English translation of part 1 of the Thiruvacakam, a classic Tamil text of Shaiva Siddhanta philosophy. It was translated by Rev. G.U. Pope. The translation includes hymns 1-10 of the Thiruvacakam, which praise Shiva and recount the soul's journey from ignorance to enlightenment through Shiva's grace. The hymns use rich metaphor and imagery to describe Shiva's nature and roles in creation, protection, destruction, and granting liberation to souls.
